how-it-works.heading: How FarmBridge Works
how-it-works.subheading: Our blockchain-powered platform ensures every donation reaches the right farmer with complete transparency and accountability.

step1.title: Registration & Verification
step1.description: Farmers and donors sign up on the platform by sharing basic information. The platform team verifies their identities to make sure everyone involved is real and trustworthy. This builds a safe and transparent community from the start.

step2.title: Farmers Request Help, Donors Support
step2.description: Verified farmers can ask for help by posting what they need - like money for seeds, tools, or water systems - and how much it will cost. Donors then browse these requests and choose which ones to support. Donations go directly to the farmer with full transparency.

step3.title: Funds Delivered, Reputation Grows
step3.description: When a farmer receives help and uses it properly, the donor's trust score goes up. This encourages more honest giving and builds a strong cycle of support. If help isn't claimed in time, the money is safely returned to the donor. Every action is recorded and visible to everyone â€” so nothing is hidden.

detailedExplanation.heading: The FarmBridge Process
detailedExplanation.subheading: A detailed look at how our platform connects donors with farmers through blockchain technology.

step1.title: Registration & Verification
step1.donorRegistrationDescription: Organizations or individuals register by providing their name, description, and connecting their Ethereum wallet. This creates a transparent identity on the blockchain.
step1.farmerRegistrationDescription: Farmers register by providing their name, location, farm type, and connecting their Ethereum wallet. This creates a verifiable profile that donors can review.
step1.verificationProcessDescription: The platform owner verifies both donors and farmers to ensure legitimacy. This adds an extra layer of trust to the ecosystem.

step2.title: Disbursement Creation
step2.farmerRequestDescription: Verified farmers explain what they need, why they need it, and how much money is required - like support for seeds, irrigation, or tools.
step2.donorsChooseDescription: Verified donors go through these requests and decide who they want to help, based on the farmer's story, location, or type of farming.
step2.secureFundingDescription: Once a donor sends support, the platform makes sure the money is safely sent to the right farmer and records everything openly on the blockchain â€” so nothing can be hidden or changed.

step3.title: Secure & Transparent Funding
step3.farmersReceiveDescription: When a donor supports a farmer's request, the farmer gets notified and can claim the funds directly into their wallet before the deadline.
step3.trustReputationDescription: Every time a donation is successfully claimed and used, the donor's trust score goes up â€” encouraging more honest giving and long-term support.
step3.noWastedFundsDescription: If a farmer doesn't claim the help in time, the money safely goes back to the donor, making sure nothing is lost or stuck.

benefits.heading: Benefits of FarmBridge
benefits.subheading: Our platform offers unique advantages for both donors and farmers through blockchain technology.
benefits.transparencyDescription: All transactions are recorded on the blockchain, creating a transparent and immutable record of fund movement.
benefits.directConnectionDescription: Donors and farmers connect directly without intermediaries, reducing overhead and increasing impact.
benefits.efficiencyDescription: Smart contracts automate the disbursement and claiming process, reducing administrative overhead.
benefits.sustainabilityDescription: The platform encourages long-term relationships between donors and farmers, promoting sustainable development.

vision.heading: Our Vision
vision.description: At FarmBridge, we envision a world where small farmers thrive through direct, transparent access to the resources they need. By leveraging blockchain technology, we aim to eliminate inefficiencies and intermediaries in aid distributionâ€”empowering farmers, restoring trust, and fostering sustainable agricultural growth across developing communities.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We believe in complete transparency in aid distribution. Our blockchain-based platform ensures that every transaction is recorded and visible to all stakeholders.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
